channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge finds probable cause to hold Trump administration in criminal contempt in deportation flights case
item.description: It's the latest legal development in response to the Trump administration's efforts to implement widespread deportations.

item.title: Can Trump fire Powell? This Supreme Court case may determine the answer.
U.S. initial jobless claims fall to two-month low
Economic calendar: Jobless claims and housing starts are among Thursday’s data
Markets will 'crash' if Trump can fire Fed's Powell, Elizabeth Warren warns
item.description: Warren, a frequent Powell critic, spoke after Trump griped hours earlier that Fed Chair Jerome Powell's "termination cannot come fast enough!"

item.title: Lilly’s stock soars in premarket on successful result in weight-loss-pill trial
Individual Investors have never before been this bearish for this long: survey

item.title: Trump fires Democratic board members of credit union watchdog
item.description: The White House fired two Democratic board members of the National Credit Union Administration amid Trump's effort to influence independent regulatory...

item.title: California suing Trump to stop his 'unlawful' tariffs
item.description: Trump's tariffs have whipped up historic market volatility and frayed America's relationships with its allies and trading partners.
